author: barnabasbusa
content:
As far as I see, EOF will have these EIPs: ```
1: EIP-3540
2: EIP-3670
3: EIP-4200
4: EIP-4750
5: EIP-5450
``` <@360491619402776577> <@341574016160497665> <@792822129019584562> Could you also pls confirm these EIPs are implemented in geth/besu/ethereumjs?

author: potuz
content: What's the status of Erigon for Shanghai? I see you guys have been testing most combinations for a while now except for Erigon. We have plenty of users running it now

author: jochembrouwer
content:
EJS does not have 4200 / 4750/ 5450 merged yet. 
This is the WIP PR: https://github.com/ethereumjs/ethereumjs-monorepo/pull/2453
I plan to open it for reviews either today or tomorrow

author: jochembrouwer
content: And this is indeed a problem for now, we lack the tests (there are many draft PRs in ethereum/tests though, but since we do not know on which specific version of the EIPs these tests are generated, it makes no sense to run against them, because they might run on a different spec version)

author: jochembrouwer
content: Do you have internal tests for these EIPs? I would love to take a look to see if I'm covering everything ðŸ™‚
